tokens.name: MOLTY / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:
**Rationale:**  
- **Buy/Sell Pressure:** Ratio of 1.2 (balanced) with **recent flow momentum** (72% buys in last 100 trades) indicates **conservative BUY**.  
- **Limit Order:** Strong buying pressure (recent 100 trades: 72% buys) overrides high volatility (325.8% price change), so **0% limit** (market order).  
- **Take Profit:** Medium volume ($30k) → +10% to +20% → **+15%** (mid-range).  
- **Stop Loss:** High volatility (325.8% price change) → **-15%** (standard high-volatility SL).  
- **Time Frame:** High volatility → **1h** (quick trade).  

**Decision:** BUY with aggressive entry (0% limit) and moderate risk/reward (15% TP, 15% SL).
